33 #define WrapCheckXMPFilesRef(result,WCallProto) \
34  WXMP_Result wResult; \
35  WCallProto; \
36  PropagateException ( wResult ); \
37  XMPFilesRef result = XMPFilesRef(wResult.ptrResult)
38 
39 static XMP_Bool WrapProgressReport ( XMP_ProgressReportProc proc, void * context,
40  float elapsedTime, float fractionDone, float secondsToGo )
41 {
42  bool ok;
43  try {
44  ok = (*proc) ( context, elapsedTime, fractionDone, secondsToGo );
45  } catch ( ... ) {
46  ok = false;
47  }
48  return ConvertBoolToXMP_Bool( ok );
49 }
50

52 
53 static XMP_Bool WrapFilesErrorNotify ( XMPFiles_ErrorCallbackProc proc, void * context,
54  XMP_StringPtr filePath, XMP_ErrorSeverity severity, XMP_Int32 cause, XMP_StringPtr message )
55 {
56  bool ok;
57  try {
58  ok = (*proc) ( context, filePath, severity, cause, message );
59  } catch ( ... ) {
60  ok = false;
61  }
62  return ConvertBoolToXMP_Bool( ok );
63 }
